channel.title: Last time you were a noob...
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
I started this thread because I remebered me playing first time Warcraft 3 (DotA) and trying to figure our Gmods' Wire Mod. So my question is: When was the last time you really thought you were a absolute 'newbie' in a game?
Cheers :slight_smile: (christmas is now over)

item.title: Last time you were a noob...
item.dc:creator: AI13
item.description:
First Aid training in America’s Army. Actual First Aid is easier to remember than that.

Read full topic

  2. My Internet is slow.

qwert33:

Hi everyone,

I started this thread because I remebered me playing first time Warcraft 3 (DotA) and trying to figure our Gmods’ Wire Mod.
So my question is: When was the last time you really thought you were a absolute ‘newbie’ in a game?

Cheers
(christmas is now over)

I like your avatar \m/

item.title: Last time you were a noob...
item.dc:creator: Teh_Casino
item.description:
Starcraft Starcraft Starcraft

You could play for months on end, and you will still get your ass handed to you by D level players.

FPS games you can be good at in one or two weeks.

Read full topic
item.source: Last time you were a noob...

item.title: Last time you were a noob...
item.dc:creator: Moonpooman
item.description:
λdam:

Garry’s Mod RP.

Oh yeah. :retard:

Sounds almost like me.
I started, walked over to a door, pressed “E”.
“HL2 has crashed, do you want to cry?”

Last time?
When i got owned by BOTS with NORMAL AI on CSS!

Read full topic

item.title: Last time you were a noob...
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
The first time I played CS I felt like I would never be able to learn how to play properly.

But the next day I pwned everyone at the internet cafe and was declared a pro.

item.title: Last time you were a noob...
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Neon Impulse:

Life.

After years of pwning nubz on CS:S, I’ve forgotten how to play real life. :fffuuu:


“…We’re sorry, your son has forgotten how to breath… He did, however, mention something about “lag,” in his final moments…”

Read full topic

item.source: Last time you were a noob...

item.title: Last time you were a noob...
item.dc:creator: Somatti
item.description:
uuuuum, I played Half-life, then MOHAA, then Halflife, then I got a kickass computer and played Fear, Fear2, and then I played Bioshock… um everyone told me it was a great game, but the accuracy of every gun u get is absolute BS, on top of that, the only gun worth using ever was the shotty, so i feel like a noob when the only possible way of me beating the game is by buffing the shit out of the wrench and killing everything(not an exageration) with it. Of course I use the freeze thingy to make it a little more fair on my half :fffuuu:

Read full topic
item.source: Last time you were a noob...

item.title: Last time you were a noob...
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
bigfan421:

when I responded to a “steam database got hacked” email by following its instructions, I actually got hacked…

You, sir, fail at the internetz.

Read full topic
